key_risks: Regulatory and rate hike challenges, including potential rejection of proposed rate increases
Reliance on fossil fuels and pressure to accelerate transition to renewable energy
Customer service complaints impacting reputation and satisfaction
controversies: Criticism from state legislators and advocacy groups over proposed rate hikes
Customer service complaints, including billing and service termination issues
environmental_issues: Pressure to reduce carbon footprint and transition away from fossil fuels
Reliance on natural gas and third-party electricity generation
social_issues: Customer service complaints and potential impact on customer satisfaction
Burden of proposed rate hikes on ratepayers
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and delays in project approvals
Integration risks from recent acquisition of Bangor Natural Gas Co.
